TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 347
TEI.2.document_title: J M Viesca to Stephen F Austin, 03-18-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Governor José Maria Viesca to Austin, Saltillo, March 18, 1830. Quoting instructions to land commisisoner to extend no titles without consent of empresarios. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 347

text.body:

*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="03-18-1830">March 18, 1830.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar*/p*
